column4: I currently have a "debian" menu and a "gnome" menu, I would like some documentation on them and also I'd like to be able to merge them, could anyone help ?
does anyone know why there is a separate "debian" menu ?
you should be all set just uncheck Debian you got it?
well, I would like to understand why the debian menu exists in the first place, when I'm using fluxbox the gnome menu does not appear bu the debian menu does. Why is that, can I replace either or ?
